resources.string: Hello! My name is WOVEY! I\'ll help you figure out what \'Shikaku\' is!
So, Shikaku is a board game that contains many cells with numbers in them.
For this tutorial, let\'s use a 2x2 board.
Your job is to divide the board into rectangles.
Each rectangle contains only ONE number.
The number indicates how many cells are contained in the rectangle.
Try to create rectangles in this puzzle by swiping your finger and solve it.
You\'re a rock! Now you\'re ready to conquer Shikaku!
